text:
@realDonaldTrump Joe Biden said Americans have "no confidence" in President Trump's response to the Coronavirus

Really?

A Gallup poll says 77% of Americans do.

In fact, Americans had LESS confidence when Biden was in the White House—just 58% were confident in Obama/Biden during Ebola

🤔
